SENT.plain: Peri-aneurysmal CSF was obtained at operation from 13 patients with subarachnoid haemorrhage from ruptured intracranial aneurysms
The 5-hydroxytryptamine antagonist ketanserin inhibited contractions of isolated human intracranial arteries, elicited by this CSF
The presence of 5-HT in CSF was confirmed by high performance liquid chromatography
The use of ketanserin in the therapy of postoperative cerebral vasospasm is discussed
